about_the_game:
Your job is simple, easy, and well-paid. Plus, your boss left you a cold beer in the fridge—tempting, right?

During your shift at the house, you'll collect personal belongings of the previous residents, carefully pack them into boxes, organize everything neatly on pallets, clean and tidy up the space, roll up and properly store carpets, and even perform minor repairs as needed.

Where’s the catch?

Well... apart from the eerie, strange writings on the walls, self-moving objects, odd weather phenomena, and the fact that the last guy quit after only 15 minutes of work—everything’s perfectly normal! If you manage to complete all your tasks before dawn and stay in one piece, your wallet will grow significantly heavier. How much? That depends on how hard you work!


Key Features:

  • First-Person Interactive Gameplay

  • Survival Mechanics

  • Engaging Storyline

  • Handyman Work Simulator Immersive Atmosphere

  • Puzzle-solving Mechanics

  • Money-Earning Mechanics


"Those list creepypastas are so popular, and they really do make for great game mechanics. I'm surprised this is the first horror game based on the list concept!"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 8 MB available space

short_description: Handyman needed—ASAP! The investor’s coming in the morning, and the house still isn’t ready! Take on an extra shift where horror meets simulation. Tackle the chaos, uncover dark secrets, and finish everything before dawn.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
